name: Genify
author: Samantha Rose
description: Generates playlists for users and using Spotify authorization code to add the playlists to a users account

scripts.start: nodemon server.js && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && export NODE_ENV=development && npm install --legacy-peer-deps"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && npm run dev
